snippet: Federal District Judge Robert F. Peckham, who issued orders on the desegregation of the San Francisco Police Department and on I.Q. testing in California schools, died today. He was 72.    His death was a result of complications after heart surger...
lead_paragraph: Federal District Judge Robert F. Peckham, who issued orders on the desegregation of the San Francisco Police Department and on I.Q. testing in California schools, died today. He was 72. His death was a result of complications after heart surgery, said the Federal District Court for Northern California, on which he sat.

headline.main: Robert F. Peckham, 72, Influential Federal Judge
